alert.note: Alert for Cass (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 06 at 4:16PM CDT until August 06 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Cass County in west central Illinois... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 416 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Beardstown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Beardstown around 425 PM CDT. Arenzville around 435 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
